Text.val: 29.05.2012 JH SCR17269 Added update of new fields FCMH_ADMNO, FCMH_CLNTNO and FCMH_DEBH_NO
06.08.2011 GB SCR16669 Changed condition of selection from ..BTPC_STATUS = 4 to

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_ID, BTPC.BTPC_BTCP_LINENO, BTPC.BTPC_LINENO, BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO, BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO, BTPC.BTPC_DEBH, BTPC.BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC, BTPC.BTPC_DATCASHREPORT, BTPC.BTPC_DATVALUECLIENT from :1/CLNT CLNT, :1/BTPC BTPC where CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = BTPC.BTPC_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = BTPC.BTPC_CLNTNO and CLNT.CLNT212_FCI = 2 and BTPC.BTPC_DATCASHREPORT = ':2' and BTPC.BTPC_STATUS >= 3 and BTPC.BTPC_DEBC_NO > 0 and BTPC.BTPC_FCI_FM13_NO = 0 and BTPC.BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE = ':3' for fetch only

Text.val: -- If all BPIV rows are handled then update MI13 row
Split the bank charge amount over all FI13 rows
-- 1 if BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC > 0 and no row exists in FM10
-- 2 if BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC < 0 and no row exists in FM10
-- 3 if BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC > 0 and row exists in FM10
-- 4 if BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC < 0 and row exists in FM10
-- FI09_DOCNR only if FCI_MSG09INV row is found where
-- store FI13 row if BPIV_INVO_SCHT_NO = 0 and PAYC_FCI_BANKCHARGES = N

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (FI13_INVCREDITNOTEAMT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FI13 where FI13_FM13_NO = :2 for fetch only

select cast (sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BPIV BPIV, :1/PAYC PAYC where BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = PAYC.PAYC_CODE and BPIV.BPIV_BTCH_ID = :2 and BPIV.BPIV_BTCP_LINENO = :3 and BPIV.BPIV_BTPC_LINENO = :4 and BPIV.BPIV_PAYMENTCODE > 0 and PAYC.PAYC_FCI_BANKCHARGES = 'Y' for fetch only
select cast (sum (FI13_BANKCHARGEAMT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FI13 where FI13_FM13_NO = :2 for fetch only
select cast (sum (FI13_BANKCHARGEAMT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/FI13 where FI13_FM13_NO = :2 for fetch only
